I am checking the supply warehouse. The current supply level is Lv %supply_count%. You can receive offers for supplies from the main castle once an alliance is in place, which can be confirmed through the supply level. Each level is increased every 6 hours while an alliance is in effect, and it can go up by 6 levels. However, please remember that you must offer a tribute of 25,000 Adena before receiving the supplies. [npc_%objectId%_receiveSupply|Receive supplies.]
